document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2009-09
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING ZONING ORDINANCE AMENDMENT ZOA 08-02 MAKING MINOR REVISIONS TO CHAPTER 19.28 OF THE ZONING ORDINANCE, INCLUSIONARY HOUSING REQUIREMENTS, TO ADJUST THE IN-LIEU HOUSING FEE BY RESOLUTION
